item.description:
It's about that time for the 2nd Annual Boylston Street Pub Crawl! Why? Why not! What else do you have going on in the middle of January?

The agenda is almost the same as last year's, except for the addition of the Back Bay Social Club which recently opened up a few months ago. This will take the place of Solas for a shorter walk from Whiskey's.

2:00 pm - Dillon's
3:00 pm - Cactus Club
4:00 pm - McGreevy's
5:00 pm - The Pour House
6:00 pm - Lir
7:00 pm - Back Bay Social Club (NEW!)
8:00 pm - Whiskey Smokehouse

Everyone's invited. Guests are welcome and encouraged to attend. The more, the merrier!

There is no entrance fee to attend, just pay for your own drinks, food, etc, and have a good time!

A theme may be announced at a later point in time. Suggestions are welcome. Please RSVP to attend. This event has been posted through the Red Sox Natives Meetup Group as well.

John will send out his cell phone number the day before this event to those who RSVP "yes".
item.name: Boylston Street Pub Crawl II
